data.title: Transport revenue of Renfe Operadora, by segment 2021
data.meta_description: In 2021, the transport revenue of the Spanish company Renfe Operadora amounted to approximately 1.5 billion euros, with the passenger transport segment accounting for almost 88 percent of the transportation income of the state-owned railway company.
